message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

This paper is about action localization in videos, which is a topic related to computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper proposes a new type of convolutional layer, which is a technique used in deep learning, so cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also likely sub-categories. The paper also evaluates its proposed method on THUMOS'14 and ActivityNet datasets, which are commonly used in multimedia research, so cs.MM (Multimedia) is another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper involves feature representation and classification, which are also relevant to information retrieval, so cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is a less likely but still possible sub-category.
